snippet.title: Tails of Iron 2 | Launch Trailer | Out NOW - PC, PlayStation, Xbox & Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter is out NOW on PC, PlayStation, Xbox & Nintendo Switch!

Buy Now:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2473480/Tails_of_Iron_2_Whiskers_of_Winter/

PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009898 

Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-gb/games/store/tails-of-iron-2-whiskers-of-winter/9ppkmqfxr7fr

Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/tails-of-iron-ii-whiskers-of-winter-cf6611

Nintendo: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/tails-of-iron-2-whiskers-of-winter-switch/

Embark upon a vast, snow-ravaged kingdom in Tails of Iron 2, sequel to the critically acclaimed action-RPG. As Arlo, heir to the Warden of the Wastes, adventure through harsh northern lands, home to giant beasts and ragtag bandits, in an epic quest to overcome an ancient, blood-starved evil.
